product_description: The EcoTools XL Body Buffer is our sustainable exfoliating body scrubber that helps to remove dry skin while cleansing in the bath or shower. This body sponge is in an extra-large size and features an easy-to-hold strap for quick, easy usage. Just wet the shower buffer, add your favorite body wash, cleanser, or body scrub, and massage it all over your skin. When you’re finished, hang the shower body scrubber to dry. Designed with everyone’s needs in mind, EcoTools’ superior assortment of bath and skincare accessories are accessible luxuries, good for you and the planet. This XL Body Buffer is made with recycled polyester and, as with all our EcoTools products, it’s 100% cruelty-free and vegan. EcoTools believes in taking the guesswork out of sustainability by making quality, eco-conscious personal care products accessible to everyone. We aim to create high performing, consciously crafted products that work for you, the planet, and your wallet. From exceptional makeup brushes and sponges to eco-friendly bath brushes and accessories, our products are not only sustainable and effective, but they are also always 100% vegan and cruelty-free.

short_description: African Net Sponge Authentic – This African net sponge showcases its genuine quality through its uniquely knotted structure—the signature knot pattern of authentic African net sponges. These knots deliver a classic gentle exfoliating texture and an open-weave design (facilitating lathering, reaching hard-to-clean areas, and quick drying), while eliminating the fragility of knotless net sponges to provide a long-lasting, authentic experience

Exfoliating Net Sponge – Enjoy mild yet effective exfoliation with this soft African net sponge, suitable for all skin types—even sensitive skin. It removes dead cells, boosts circulation, and leaves your skin smooth and refreshed without irritation

Quick-Drying & Reusable – Made from durable polyester fibers, this sponge is machine washable, quick-drying, and eco-friendly. It retains its shape and softness over time, offering a sustainable choice for your skin and the planet

Easy to Use – Designed for effortless handling, this African net cloth creates a rich lather with soap or body wash. Stretching up to 45 inches, it easily cleans hard-to-reach areas, making every shower a spa-like experience

Travel-Friendly – Take your skincare routine anywhere! This African net sponge comes with a compact pouch, making it easy to pack for trips, gym sessions, or vacations. Lightweight and clean—perfect for maintaining your glow on the go
